item.title: Portfolio Performance
item.description: Portfolio Performance The objective of the portfolio is to achieve the following against the benchmarks, Highest daily win rates in positive periods Highest sharpe ratio Highest sortino ratio Lowest max drawdowns against benchmarks Shortest recovery to previous watermark Positive alpha against benchmarks Low beta against benchmarks (< 0.5) Low correlation with the benchmarks (< 0.5) Goal of my portfolio is to go against conventional wisdom of higher risk, higher returns through a risk parity approach!
